string.text: Radius Settings: Outside of this radius NPCs are not affected
Outside of this radius NPCs are not affected by anomalies, regardless of their setting. This improves performance and reduces the overabundance of loot.
You have three options: Always affected, never affected, or affected based on chance.

If you choose Companions to be affected based on chance, then this slider affects the percent chance they will be impacted. 0 means never affected, 1 means always affected, 0.5 means 50 percent chance they will be affected.
Setting for Traders and other Important NPCs:
You have three options: Always affected, never affected, or affected based on chance.

If you choose Important NPCs to be affected based on chance, then this slider affects the percent chance they will be impacted. 0 means never affected, 1 means always affected, 0.5 means 50 percent chance they will be affected.
You have three options: Always affected, never affected, or affected based on chance.

If you choose all other NPCs to be affected based on chance, then this slider affects the percent chance they will be impacted. 0 means never affected, 1 means always affected, 0.5 means 50 percent chance they will be affected.
